info.name: 4chan Minimal Dark Blue
info.description: Turns 4chan into a minimal dark theme with dark blue accents.
info.additionalInfo:
1.1.7 - Removed padding, margin and border elements

1.1.6 - Made thumbnails all squares

1.1.5 - URL hot fix

1.1.4 - Fixed Smaller CSS stuff

1.1.3 - I changed how replies looked in a thread because my OCD went off

1.0.2 - Minor color and display changes for mobile version

1.0.1 - Minor changes in the settings popup at the bottom of the page.

1.0.0 - Original theme with mostly everything in order.
